name: v1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Added IP address by @emilm in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/18
* added logging based on slf4j by @CptMauli in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/22
* Replaced slf4j with log4j 2 by @emilm in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/27
* Adding all Parameter for ClientCoreProfile factory by @steven-smpct in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/28
* Add a namespace fix to get 1.6 soap request through by @lahnaoja in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/30
* Fix namespace in soap headers of responses by @lahnaoja in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/32
* Changing Ping interval, added debugging message, fixed Sec-WebSocket-Protocol, and fixed wss by @steven-smpct in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/33
* Revert "Changing Ping interval, added debugging message, fixed Sec-We… by @TVolden in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/35
* Add DiagnosticsStatusNotification support. by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/38
* Switched logging to slf4j + logback. by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/39
* 0.5 use optionals by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/40
* 0.5 closed flag exposed by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/41
* 0.5 wss support by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/42
* 0.5 changeable ping interval by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/43
* 0.5 new utilities by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/44
* 0.5 json stable under load by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/45
* 0.5 cleanup by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/47
* Add FirmwareStatusNotification support. by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/48
* 0.5 test coverage for utilities by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/49
* Resolve all conflicts for these commits by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/56
* 0.5 cleanup spec added to json tests by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/55
* Small changes for PR #56. by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/58
* Tests added, critical Sonar complains resolved by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/59
* Propertyconstraintexception is unchecked by @spyros87 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/65
* Let #getRetries() return an Integer instead of int by @rtzll in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/67
* Add create methods to the ClientFirmwareManagementProfile by @rtzll in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/68
* Add UUID parameter to server firmware management handler by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/70
* Fixes for compatibility and cleanup issues by @eupakhomov in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/69
* JSONCommunicator: use ZonedDateTime to parse OCPP DateTime (ISO8601) by @JanLapp in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/73
* Add some logs: send and recv events. by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/76
* Reimplement toString() by eu.chargetime.ocpp.utilities.MoreObjects.to StringHelper. by @sumlin in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/77
* Bugfix/set charging profile request by @froehr in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/80
* Change SetChargingProfile.req attribute validation according to documentation by @froehr in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/83
* Implement ClearChargingProfileRequest and Confirmation by @froehr in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/85
* Add transactionId to validation method of StartTransactionConfirmation by @simonweiser in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/91
* improve FeatureRepository impl performance by @goekay in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/96
* Multiple changes by @raddatzk in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/101
* Allow zero interval by @TVolden in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/107
* fixed wrong case in parameter. by @TVolden in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/106
* fix(common): set correct description from CallError by @thetric in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/108
* Update to fix verifyGoogleJavaFormat exception issue #106 by @artado in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/109
* Update GetCompositeScheduleRequest.java by @TVolden in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/113
* Make OCPP library compatible with Android 8 by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/116
* Bump Java-WebSocket from 1.3.8 to 1.5.0 in /OCPP-J by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/117
* Bump Java-WebSocket from 1.3.8 to 1.5.0 in /ocpp-v1_6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/119
* Bump Java-WebSocket from 1.3.8 to 1.5.0 in /ocpp-v2_0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/118
* Really allow zero interval + fix integer comparisons by @marcinar in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/120
* Fix NPE on incoming DataTransferRequest by @TomMarkuske in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/122
* Add support for HTTP Basic Authentication by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/123
* Bump Java-WebSocket consistently to 1.5.1 by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/124
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /ocpp-v1_6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/127
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /ocpp-common by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/125
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /ocpp-v1_6-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/126
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /ocpp-v2_0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/128
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /ocpp-v2_0-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/129
* Bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13.1 in /OCPP-J by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/130
* Allow omitting all optional SampledValue fields by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/140
* Bump logback-classic from 1.1.2 to 1.2.0 in /ocpp-v2_0-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/149
* Bump logback-classic from 1.1.2 to 1.2.0 in /ocpp-v1_6-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/148
* Bump logback-core from 1.1.2 to 1.2.0 in /ocpp-v2_0-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/147
* Bump logback-core from 1.1.2 to 1.2.0 in /ocpp-v1_6-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/146
* Fix ZonedDateTimeSerializer (ISO 8601) by @Kubster96 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/145
* Add support for non-printable HTTP passwords by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/143
* Rename enum ChangingRateUnitType to ChargingRateUnitType (Typo) by @Kubster96 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/150
* Allow optional IdTagInfo in SendLocalList for deleting entries by @jmluy in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/152
* Add toString to Message for clearer logs by @jmluy in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/153
* Fix Maven build/dependency error by @jmluy in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/154
* Remove logback dependency by @sandeepmattepu in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/155
* JSON Server and Client example application by @MauroBono in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/162
* Client authentication on server side via callback by @dimaa6 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/163
* Enable ws connection timeout by @srehlig in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/159
* reset failed flag before sending retry messages by @listestalo in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/167
* make number of web-socket-workers / decoders configurable by @listestalo in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/166
* add support for accessing 'X-Forwarded-For' field respectively proxied address by @listestalo in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/165
* Support OCPP 2.0 status notification by @jmluy in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/156
* Made Gson static to avoid creating it for each (de)serialization requ… by @dimaa6 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/169
* Use thread pool for executing tasks asynchronously by @dimaa6 in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/171
* raise gmavenplus-plugin from 1.6 to 1.13.1 by @in-fke in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/174
* Features/fix profile initialization (nulls and cross-over in FirmwareManagementProfiles) by @in-fke in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/176
* Upgrade Java-Websocket dependency to 1.5.2 by @m-oben in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/178
* Expose a client's session ID by @m-oben in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/180
* Revert "Features/fix profile initialization (nulls and cross-over in FirmwareManagementProfiles)" by @TVolden in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/184
* Fix broken gradle build, tests and Android 8.0 compatibility by @robert-s-ubi in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/185
* Provide method to check if given session is still open by @jmluy in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/188
* Allow HTTP Healthcheck (used by cloud load balancer) by @danielcaro in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/189
* Bump logback-core from 1.2.0 to 1.2.9 in /ocpp-v1_6-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/190
* Bump logback-core from 1.2.0 to 1.2.9 in /ocpp-v2_0-test by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/191
* Bump gson from 2.8.0 to 2.8.9 in /OCPP-J by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/192
* Bump gson from 2.8.8 to 2.8.9 in /ocpp-v1_6-example/json_server_example by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/193
* Bump gson from 2.8.8 to 2.8.9 in /ocpp-v1_6-example/json-client-implementation by @dependabot in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/194
* Feature/ocpp security extensions by @m-oben in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/196
* ServerEvents.authenticateSession should again throw AuthenticationExc… by @m-oben in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/198

## New Contributors
* @CptMauli made their first contribution in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/22

* @thetric made their first contribution in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/108
* @artado made their first contribution in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/109
* @robert-s-ubi made their first contribution in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/116

* @marcinar made their first contribution in https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/pull/120

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChargeTimeEU/Java-OCA-OCPP/compare/v0.3...v1.1

name: SOAP/JSON support
body:
Use this release to setup a server or client running OCPP version 1.6 with JSON Websocket (OCPP-J) or SOAP Webservice (OCPP-S)

Requests included in core feature:
- Authorize
- BootNotification
- ChangeAvailability
- ChangeConfiguration
- ClearCache
- DataTransfer
- GetConfiguration
- Heartbeat
- MeterValues
- RemoteStartTransaction
- RemoteStopTransaction
- Reset
- StartTransaction
- StatusNotification
- StopTransaction
- UnlockConnector

Requests included in smart charging feature:
- SetChargingProfile

Requests included in remote trigger feature:
- TriggerMessage

Requests included in firmware management feature:
- GetDiagnostics

Please see JSONClientSample.java / SOAPClientSample.java and JSONServerSample.java / SOAPServerSample.java for examples on how to set up a client and server.

name: Server/Client core features
body:
Use this release to setup a server or client running OCPP version 1.6 with JSON Websocket (OCPP-J).

Requests included in core feature:
- Authorize
- BootNotification
- ChangeAvailability
- ChangeConfiguration
- ClearCache
- DataTransfer
- GetConfiguration
- Heartbeat
- MeterValues
- RemoteStartTransaction
- RemoteStopTransaction
- Reset
- StartTransaction
- StatusNotification
- StopTransaction
- UnlockConnector

Please see JSONClientSample.java and JSONServerSample.java for examples on how to set up a client and server.

name: Client core features
body:
Use this release to implement the client core profile features from OCPP-J version 1.6.
Update: Changed common lib from SNAPSHOT to alpha version.
